name: StudyBuddy
signal_source: Educational research shows 'internet access is dependent on context and is a major constraint on opportunities for online learning'
description: Offline-first study companion that syncs when connected but maintains full functionality without internet access
target_user: Students in areas with poor connectivity who struggle with study apps that require constant internet access
pain_point_evidence: Students report 'non-availability of technical infrastructure and uninterrupted internet connectivity were the biggest challenges'
core_loop: Study completely offline with notes and quizzes
differentiation: Offline-first vs. connectivity-dependent, designed for unreliable internet access
subscription_fit: Premium includes advanced offline content, study analytics, and expanded storage

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic offline features, premium for advanced content and analytics
